name: LUMBERING SPRITES
description:
A short horror game with 1-bit graphics, inspired by Five Nights at Freddy’s. Made in under a week for Spooktober Jam 2021.

We didn’t have time to include everything we hoped to, but it is playable, and we hope you enjoy!

HOW TO PLAY:

  • Watch the security cameras for monsters. Use the arrow keys to switch feeds
  • Press spacebar to kill any monsters in view — and sacrifice that camera feed for ten seconds
  • Survive as long as you can!

CREDITS:

  • Code: pawprints
  • Music and art: choosh
  • Engine: Love2D
